column1: [Admin tool] Partner level category : DLD & Favepay Live,FAVE-13657,44706,44689,Sub-task,Closed,FAVE,Fave,software,Azuan Zira Zairein,557058:9ed2af55-7ed4-4d71-9112-86f1860c12d0,,,Medium,Done,Pengiran Nazrin Awangku Bakhrunnuddin,5dd23d98b63a210fb4b68e16,Katelyn Soo,557058:2f835b06-e18a-42a8-af45-3231fc68d42c,Katelyn Soo,557058:2f835b06-e18a-42a8-af45-3231fc68d42c,25/May/21 11:56 AM,17/Jun/21 11:12 AM,29/Dec/21 5:32 PM,16/Jun/21 4:17 PM,Admin Tool,Backend,,,,0,admintool,admin-tool,internaltool,internaltools,,,,"Given that on partner level should be using the new flow, when user uses quick edit or inner partner page, partner category be grey out and user should use main category to update as its mandatory.
Normal Case Scenarios - basic flow of the story
* user able to *successfully update main category* on *partner quick edit* on *deal live & favepay live*
* *Main category to be mandatory* on *deal live & favepay live quick edit* and *partner level inner page*
* Deprecate *Parent Category* on Merchant Connect and use *Main Category*

h3. column1: MC : Contract : Favebiz Fee extension,FAVE-12608,43357,,Story,Closed,FAVE,Fave,software,Azuan Zira Zairein,557058:9ed2af55-7ed4-4d71-9112-86f1860c12d0,,,Medium,Done,Mohamed Zakarya Fekry,5d47d704da0c4d0c789a4541,Katelyn Soo,557058:2f835b06-e18a-42a8-af45-3231fc68d42c,Katelyn Soo,557058:2f835b06-e18a-42a8-af45-3231fc68d42c,19/Jan/21 10:14 PM,01/Nov/21 11:36 AM,29/Dec/21 5:32 PM,25/Jan/21 4:23 PM,Admin Tool,,,,,0,admintool,internaltools,merchant_connect,,,,,"As a BD, when i generate the contract favebiz fee waiver should be extended to 31st Dec 2021 so that thereâ€™s less oe step for  me to edit.

* Need to run rake task to back-fill updated info to all profile in the system

[MC] RPP Flow (ONLY MY),FAVE-13585,44623,,Story,Closed,FAVE,Fave,software,Azuan Zira Zairein,557058:9ed2af55-7ed4-4d71-9112-86f1860c12d0,,,Medium,Done,Hisyam Syazani,602b5d0f7fbca20070b65a41,Katelyn Soo,557058:2f835b06-e18a-42a8-af45-3231fc68d42c,Katelyn Soo,557058:2f835b06-e18a-42a8-af45-3231fc68d42c,09/May/21 1:36 AM,14/Sep/21 9:20 AM,29/Dec/21 5:32 PM,14/Sep/21 9:20 AM,Admin Tool,MC,,,,0,admintool,admin-tool,internaltool,internaltools,,,,"*Given* that submission for an RPP merchant on Malaysia, *When* i created a favepay, *Then* RPP upload documents will pop up , depending on submitting for main or sub entity it will direct to different section, If i want to submit later, a sticky banner will be on the top of the page.
Normal Case Scenarios - basic flow of the story
* When user created a new favepay submission for the new merchant or an existing merchant without favepay previously , a RPP pop up will appear to ask user upload RPP documents
If user click on not now > a sticky banner will appear on top of the page and user unable to submit merchant
If user click on â€œUpload RPP documentsâ€, there will be another pop up asking who are you signing with *Main Entity* OR *Sub-entity*
* User will be directed to Main entity info section , where the RPP documents located
* User will need to fill in the merchant declaration and upload relevant documents in order to proceed with submit merchant.
* User will be directed to sub-entity info section, user will see RPP Documents on â€œPendingâ€ status
* By clicking into individual sub-entity , user will see the entity details : {{Business Details / Favebiz Account(s) / RPP Documents}}
* user will need to fill in the declaration form and upload the relevant documents for RPP on a sub-entity level
* Info inputted for merchant declaration , will be used in the favepay addendum for respective contract.
* Once user, successfully filled in and uploaded all required documents , user able to proceed to submit merchant.

column1: (4) [BE] FPL Creation Page : FPL Details,FAVE-14577,45775,,Story,Closed,FAVE,Fave,software,Azuan Zira Zairein,557058:9ed2af55-7ed4-4d71-9112-86f1860c12d0,,,Medium,Done,Hisyam Syazani,602b5d0f7fbca20070b65a41,Katelyn Soo,557058:2f835b06-e18a-42a8-af45-3231fc68d42c,Katelyn Soo,557058:2f835b06-e18a-42a8-af45-3231fc68d42c,24/Jul/21 3:51 PM,08/Sep/21 5:50 PM,29/Dec/21 5:32 PM,08/Sep/21 5:50 PM,Admin Tool,,,,,0,admintool,admin-tool,internaltool,internaltools,,,,"*Given that* user landed on the FavePay Later creation page, *When* use selected a Model, *Then* Fee details table will appear.
*Given that* user needs to add a â€œAdd a durationâ€ , *when* user click on add a duration, *then* a Model will pop up for user to fill in necessary information
Normal Case Scenarios - basic flow of the story
* Once user land on FPL creation page, user able to *select a fee model* , dropdown consists of:
(1) {{Cashback Offset model}} (2) {{FavePay Later fee model }}(3) {{Hybrid model}} (Approval required) will be in a pill form

* One a model is selected, â€œFee Deatailâ€ table will appear will *Duration*, *Cashback offset (%)* & *FavePay Later fee (%)* as header , below with â€œ*Add a duration*â€ button, once a duration inputted it will reword to â€œ*add another duration*â€
* User click on Add a Duration , Pop up will appear with :
(1) Select start date  > first creation is the submission, date will have no value
(2) Is there a fee end date > Yes or No {color:#ff5630}*(By default is No)*{color}
user selected â€œ*Yes*â€ > Fee end date will appear

user decided â€œ*No*â€ > user will proceed with filling in the cashback and user {color:#ff5630}*will not be able to add another duration, the â€œadd a duration button will be hidden after saveâ€*{color}
(3) Cashback field > input is numeric & allow decimal place
+*Cashback offset model Or FavePay Later fee model*+, there will only be *ONE* cashback field
+*Hybrid model*+ , there will be *BOTH* Cashback offset (%) and FavePay Later fee (%)
*Note:* Cashback rate should be reflected on related column based on the model.
- Confirm button will only light up once all information is filled.
* User can either *Cancel* or *Confirm* information, once confirmed information will be save in the table format, user able to *edit or delete*
- If edit > pop up will appear for user to edit
- If delete > A confirmation box will pop up
* User only allow to click add another duration, if the previous duration is with an end date
* By adding another duration, the *start date must begins on the day after the previous end date, start date will be auto populated and disabled.*
* If user created a duration without an end date , once its save, it should capture as â€œStart date - Onwardsâ€

* User initially chosen cashback offset or favepay later model, half way switch to hybrid model, when user save , will not allow and prompt the red box on fee details table and indicate â€œPlease fill in both (%)
* User chosen cashback offset, half way switch to favepay later fee or vise versa, the cashback will be switched as well.
* When user adding another duration and change the start date too something else instead of the next day of the previous end date, an error massage will prompt
* By adding another duration, *cashback rate cannot be the same as the previous created duration within the submission*. (if not will prompt error msg)

column1: (4) [FE] FPL Creation Page : FPL Details,FAVE-14578,45776,,Story,Closed,FAVE,Fave,software,Azuan Zira Zairein,557058:9ed2af55-7ed4-4d71-9112-86f1860c12d0,,,Medium,Done,Alex Safian,60f51e529f975e0069a42c9d,Katelyn Soo,557058:2f835b06-e18a-42a8-af45-3231fc68d42c,Katelyn Soo,557058:2f835b06-e18a-42a8-af45-3231fc68d42c,24/Jul/21 3:54 PM,08/Sep/21 5:50 PM,29/Dec/21 5:32 PM,08/Sep/21 5:50 PM,Admin Tool,,,,,0,admintool,admin-tool,internaltool,internaltools,,,,"*Given that* user landed on the FavePay Later creation page, *When* use selected a Model, *Then* Fee details table will appear.
*Given that* user needs to add a â€œAdd a durationâ€ , *when* user click on add a duration, *then* a Model will pop up for user to fill in necessary information
Normal Case Scenarios - basic flow of the story
* The *Back arrow* on the top will direct user back to the previous page
* Below back arrow will be a sub header of â€œ*fave products*â€
* Once user land on FPL creation page, user able to *select a fee model* , dropdown consists of:
(1) {{Cashback Offset model}} (2) {{FavePay Later fee model }}(3) {{Hybrid model}} (Approval required) will be in a pill form
* Once fee model is selected, the title will be place at the top of the field, same goes to other fields.
* One a model is selected, â€œFee Detailsâ€ empty table will appear with â€œ*No information added yet.*â€
-below table will thereâ€™s a â€œ*Add a duration*â€ button, once a duration created it will reword to *â€œadd another durationâ€*
h3. *User click on Add a Duration , Pop up will appear with :*
Select start date and end date (if any).
(1) Select fee start date  > first creation is the submission, date will have no value
(2) Is there a fee end date > Yes or No {color:#ff5630}*(By default is No)*{color}
user selected â€œ*Yes*â€ > Fee end date will appear

user decided â€œ*No*â€ > user will proceed with filling in the cashback and user {color:#ff5630}*will not be able to add another duration, the â€œadd a duration button will be hidden after saveâ€*{color}
*Reuse Date component on MC (under deal or eCard)*
* User should only able to select the date starting from creation date
* Past date should be grey out
Based on the fee model chosen.
Cashback field > input is numeric & allow decimal place
+*Cashback offset model Or FavePay Later fee model*+, there will only be *ONE* cashback field
+*Hybrid model*+ , there will be *BOTH* fields Cashback offset (%) and FavePay Later fee (%)
*Note:* Cashback rate should be reflected on related column based on the model.
* User can either *Cancel* or *Confirm* information, once confirmed information will be save in the table format, user able to *edit or delete*
- If edit > pop up will appear for user to edit
- If delete > A confirmation box will pop up
* User only allow to click add another duration, if the previous duration is with an end date
* By adding another duration, the *start date must begins on the day after the previous end date, start date will be auto populated and disabled.*
* If user created a duration without an end date , once its save, it should capture as â€œStart date - Onwardsâ€

* User initially chosen cashback offset or favepay later model, half way switch to hybrid model, when user save , will not allow and prompt the red box on fee details table and indicate â€œPlease fill in both (%).
* When user adding another duration and change the start date too something else instead of the next day of the previous end date, an error massage will prompt
* By adding another duration, *cashback rate cannot be the same as the previous created duration within the submission*. (if not will prompt error msg)
* For hybrid  Model, if user created one entry and waned to create another entry with a only one different rate, user able to, but if both the same cashback , validation should occur.
Eg of first entry : Cashback offset = 5% , FPL fee = 5%
second entry : Cashback offset = 6% , FPL fee = 5%

[MC] FPL : Zerorise freemium for existing merchant,FAVE-15804,47271,,Story,Closed,FAVE,Fave,software,Azuan Zira Zairein,557058:9ed2af55-7ed4-4d71-9112-86f1860c12d0,,,Medium,Done,Hisyam Syazani,602b5d0f7fbca20070b65a41,Katelyn Soo,557058:2f835b06-e18a-42a8-af45-3231fc68d42c,Katelyn Soo,557058:2f835b06-e18a-42a8-af45-3231fc68d42c,13/Oct/21 2:09 PM,29/Oct/21 9:20 AM,17/Dec/21 2:27 PM,29/Oct/21 9:20 AM,Admin Tool,MC,,,,0,admintool,admin-tool,internaltool,internaltools,,,,*Issue:*

column1: Currently, existing merchants who did not signed and we gave them the default freemium, if those merchants have signed down the road and the fee will only picks up when the freemium exhausted. This seems creating a lost to the business of average 5-10k a month.

*Given that* existing merchant that have yet to signed FPL contract was granted x amount of freemium, *When* BD signed FPL contract for the existing merchant, then FPL status is completed, it should zerorise the freemium.

*  If user submit FPL for an existing merchant that have yet to signed contract but had freemium, once user submitted â†’ contract signed â†’ when through vetting/content & designer status switch to completed. Freemium will be zerorise.

* If the existing merchant without submission previously being submitted on MC, once ops team done,{{ status = completed.}}  On admin tool, *Remaining Freemium Transaction Count* field will be zerorize and the remaining count will be fill into *Freemium Transaction up to* filed, this is to tally back if thereâ€™s any audit dispute.

Bug : Deal page not loading,FAVE-16502,48162,,Bug,Closed,FAVE,Fave,software,Azuan Zira Zairein,557058:9ed2af55-7ed4-4d71-9112-86f1860c12d0,,,Medium,Done,Ervin Chai,61079ef7b704b40068e99bb1,Katelyn Soo,557058:2f835b06-e18a-42a8-af45-3231fc68d42c,Katelyn Soo,557058:2f835b06-e18a-42a8-af45-3231fc68d42c,22/Dec/21 3:57 PM,23/Dec/21 5:36 PM,29/Dec/21 5:32 PM,23/Dec/21 5:36 PM,Admin Tool,MC,,,,0,admintool,admin-tool,internaltool,internaltools,skip_tip,,,Issue:

column1: Kept loading, not able to open the deal page
* Caused by a long-running deal from 2019. This deal has many changes, and causes the change history to take a very long time to load.
* Even though we are using a pagination approach, we are still loading all of the records from database and then only paginating that result.

* Because we still load all of the records from database, the requests times out as the query takes a long time to complete.","22/Dec/21 7:27 PM;61079ef7b704b40068e99bb1;Solution: *Use pagination on the Version model level rather than loading all of the records from the database.*

column1: [MC] MEC Validation : Improve validation within whole flow,FAVE-16092,47619,,Story,Backlog,FAVE,Fave,software,Azuan Zira Zairein,557058:9ed2af55-7ed4-4d71-9112-86f1860c12d0,,,Medium,,,,Katelyn Soo,557058:2f835b06-e18a-42a8-af45-3231fc68d42c,Katelyn Soo,557058:2f835b06-e18a-42a8-af45-3231fc68d42c,03/Nov/21 12:38 PM,03/Nov/21 1:39 PM,29/Dec/21 5:32 PM,,Admin Tool,MC,,,,0,admintool,admin-tool,internaltool,internaltools,,,,"Given that , if user try to delete sub-entity or change sub entity on bank account, then validation will need to be in place to ensure that the correct information is aligned.

[MC] Cardlink : Fave Product Page/ Add Product on My merchant page,FAVE-15398,46736,,Story,Ready to Develop,FAVE,Fave,software,Azuan Zira Zairein,557058:9ed2af55-7ed4-4d71-9112-86f1860c12d0,,,Medium,,,,Katelyn Soo,557058:2f835b06-e18a-42a8-af45-3231fc68d42c,Katelyn Soo,557058:2f835b06-e18a-42a8-af45-3231fc68d42c,11/Sep/21 7:33 PM,11/Oct/21 9:02 AM,29/Dec/21 5:32 PM,,Admin Tool,MC,,,,0,admintool,admin-tool,internaltool,internaltools,,,,"*Given that*, Cardlink is a product , when user click on add product on Fave Product page OR add product on my merchant page, *then *the pop up will consist of cardlink option.
* when user add a product on Fave Product Page OR My merchant page , pop up should consist of Cardlink (Cashback required) Option.

â†’ When user click on Cardlink, it will direct user to the Cardlink summary page which indicate a table with *Outlet name* , *Acquirer BIN* & *Visa MID*, with an *arrow* to quick access the next page
â†’ {{Actions column}} will be hidden at this stage where user have yet to fill in any inputs, but once user save an input the actions button will appear that allows user to *edit* OR *delete*
â†’ Once Cardlink is created, {{Cardlink Card}} will indicate on Fave Product Page

â†’ If user created other product but have yet to create Cardlink, {{""Add another product}}"" card should still be there untill all product created , only it will disappear â†’ Favepay Card remove Cardlink indication
â†’ On Fave Product page, Cardlink should be removed on Favepay Card and the placement of â€œno. of outletsâ€ indication will need to be aligned with â€œfixed feeâ€

column1: [Bug] Outlet selection for Deal & Pay on MEC flow,FAVE-15423,46776,,Bug,Closed,FAVE,Fave,software,Azuan Zira Zairein,557058:9ed2af55-7ed4-4d71-9112-86f1860c12d0,,,Medium,Done,Katelyn Soo,557058:2f835b06-e18a-42a8-af45-3231fc68d42c,Katelyn Soo,557058:2f835b06-e18a-42a8-af45-3231fc68d42c,Katelyn Soo,557058:2f835b06-e18a-42a8-af45-3231fc68d42c,14/Sep/21 4:25 PM,29/Oct/21 2:47 PM,29/Dec/21 5:32 PM,29/Oct/21 2:47 PM,Admin Tool,MC,,,,0,admintool,admin-tool,internaltool,internaltools,,,,"When MEC user onboard a merchant, when they create a deal or favepay , on the outlet section will be able to see the Main and sub-entity selection.
* Apply to entities /outlets sections, beside the title will have a indication of how many outlets are being selected.

* In this section, will be displaying the main entity at the very top with the total outlets created, following by the individual entities and below it will be the outlet attached to that specific entities.
* This section is a scrollable section so that user have better visibility on whatâ€™s the option and whats being selected
* if user select the main entity checkbox, it will auto select all the outlet created.
* if user select the sub-entity, it will only auto select the outlet belongs to the sub-entity.
* user is also able to select the outlet one by one (if needed).
* If user un-select all outlet under a sub-entity, the sub-entity will be untick , if user un-select all the outlet and sub-entity, the main entity will be untick.

column1: [MC] MY : RPP Documents : SSM expiry field,FAVE-14302,45479,,Story,Backlog,FAVE,Fave,software,Azuan Zira Zairein,557058:9ed2af55-7ed4-4d71-9112-86f1860c12d0,,,Medium,,,,Katelyn Soo,557058:2f835b06-e18a-42a8-af45-3231fc68d42c,Katelyn Soo,557058:2f835b06-e18a-42a8-af45-3231fc68d42c,12/Jul/21 6:13 PM,09/Sep/21 3:44 PM,29/Dec/21 5:32 PM,,Admin Tool,,,,,0,admintool,admin-tool,internaltool,internaltools,,,,"Given that , SSM cert is one of the requirements for RPP merchant, when BD upload the SSM cert, then BD will need to input the SSM expiry date as well.

[MC-Bug] Manual submission : Company manager invalid,FAVE-14749,45973,,Bug,Backlog,FAVE,Fave,software,Azuan Zira Zairein,557058:9ed2af55-7ed4-4d71-9112-86f1860c12d0,,,Medium,,,,Katelyn Soo,557058:2f835b06-e18a-42a8-af45-3231fc68d42c,Katelyn Soo,557058:2f835b06-e18a-42a8-af45-3231fc68d42c,02/Aug/21 10:57 AM,15/Sep/21 3:48 PM,29/Dec/21 5:32 PM,,Admin Tool,,,,,0,admintool,admin-tool,internaltool,internaltools,,,,"Happening time to time, cant replicate issue:
*Context* : Currently on MC with new merchant, manual submission > error occur ""Company manager invalid""
*Debugging*: seems like this error hit when , ""uniq email *new, non uniq phone number *exist - will trigger uniqueness validation""
*Solution* : No need to create new company manager if the email OR phone number already exist
*Solution* *:* Â changing the validation to match email, so when we hit a existing phone number on MC, we will be attaching the company to the existing company manager
Step 1: log in merchant connect , create *new merchant*
Step 2: Opt in to products, created submission
Step 3: proceed to submit merchant, click on *upload contract, click submit*
submission should successfully submitted and display pop up stating contract submitted
An error stating : Company manager invalid

[Admin Tool] : Transaction Page: Group Transaction,FAVE-13643,44692,,Story,Closed,FAVE,Fave,software,Azuan Zira Zairein,557058:9ed2af55-7ed4-4d71-9112-86f1860c12d0,,,Medium,Done,Alex Safian,60f51e529f975e0069a42c9d,Katelyn Soo,557058:2f835b06-e18a-42a8-af45-3231fc68d42c,Katelyn Soo,557058:2f835b06-e18a-42a8-af45-3231fc68d42c,21/May/21 8:26 PM,21/Dec/21 11:36 AM,20/Dec/21 7:21 PM,21/Dec/21 11:36 AM,Admin Tool,,,,,0,admintool,admin-tool,internaltool,internaltools,,,,Given that Ch will  need to navigate to transaction page to assist customer, When user click on transaction , Then user only able to see individual transaction and able to expand to see more of the breakdown.
Normal Case Scenarios - basic flow of the story
* Group all breakdown together and display only the main transaction
* user have the ability to expand the main transaction to see the breakdown
* user have the ability to collapse the transaction when its not needed
* when user expand the transaction , it will be *highlighted and the border will be slightly bold* in order to differentiate the transaction.
* Able to search *Receipt IDs, Sub-receipt ID, Promo code & external ID,* the whole transaction will be display instead of just one entry.

column1: [MC] Sub Entity edit page ,FAVE-13568,44606,,Story,Closed,FAVE,Fave,software,Azuan Zira Zairein,557058:9ed2af55-7ed4-4d71-9112-86f1860c12d0,,,Medium,Done,Mohamed Zakarya Fekry,5d47d704da0c4d0c789a4541,Katelyn Soo,557058:2f835b06-e18a-42a8-af45-3231fc68d42c,Katelyn Soo,557058:2f835b06-e18a-42a8-af45-3231fc68d42c,08/May/21 1:53 AM,14/Sep/21 9:17 AM,29/Dec/21 5:32 PM,18/Aug/21 2:06 PM,MC,,,,,0,admintool,admin-tool,internaltool,internaltools,,,,"*Given* completed main entity info, *When* i click on to sub entity info, *Then* Iâ€™m able to create multiple sub entities information.
Normal Case Scenarios - basic flow of the story
* User click on sub-entity info , when land on a display sub-entity page
* On this page, user able to add sub-entity by clicking the â€œ+ â€œ icon on the top right
* On the sub-entity business details creation page, user will be asked {{â€œSame business information as merchant info?â€}}
> Yes , the official details and merchants details will be pre-filled with information inputted on main entity info section.
>  No, thereâ€™s no impact user will need to continue filling the information
* User will need to fill in official and merchant details which will be used for contract
* Merchant/Owner email will be used to sent out the *hellosign contract or addendum link email* if BD chose to contract with sub-entities.
* If user did not fill in mandatory filed and try to save, error message will appear

column1: [MC] Sub-entity info display page,FAVE-13569,44607,44606,Sub-task,Closed,FAVE,Fave,software,Azuan Zira Zairein,557058:9ed2af55-7ed4-4d71-9112-86f1860c12d0,,,Medium,Done,Mohamed Zakarya Fekry,5d47d704da0c4d0c789a4541,Katelyn Soo,557058:2f835b06-e18a-42a8-af45-3231fc68d42c,Katelyn Soo,557058:2f835b06-e18a-42a8-af45-3231fc68d42c,08/May/21 2:11 AM,14/Sep/21 9:17 AM,29/Dec/21 5:32 PM,11/Sep/21 12:09 PM,MC,,,,,0,admintool,admin-tool,internaltool,internaltools,,,,"*Given* that iâ€™ve competed filling in my sub-entity information, *When* i click on save, *Then* i will be directed to the sub-entity display page where i have visibility of all the entities ive created.
Normal Case Scenarios - basic flow of the story
* After successfully created sub-entity , user will land on the display page
* It will display : Entity name *(Business registration name in the form)*, Business registration number , Main Contact person ,RPP documents (Only applicable for MY)
* Under sub-entity thereâ€™s action button edit or delete , delete will only be allow if the sub-entity have yet to be submitted [~accountid:5d47d704da0c4d0c789a4541]  FYI.
* When user click into any of the entity created, user will land on the sub-entity details page for individual entity.
* This page consist of the business details of the sub-entity & the favebiz account(s)
* When user click into the business details, user will be able to see the summary and edit accordingly
* For editing sub-entity information, after 1st submission, thereâ€™s certain fields will be disable and not allow to edit.

column1: [MC] Cardlink : Onboarding Flow (MY/SG),FAVE-13736,44789,,Story,Closed,FAVE,Fave,software,Azuan Zira Zairein,557058:9ed2af55-7ed4-4d71-9112-86f1860c12d0,,,Medium,Done,Hisyam Syazani,602b5d0f7fbca20070b65a41,Katelyn Soo,557058:2f835b06-e18a-42a8-af45-3231fc68d42c,Katelyn Soo,557058:2f835b06-e18a-42a8-af45-3231fc68d42c,01/Jun/21 12:14 PM,05/Jul/21 10:21 AM,29/Dec/21 5:32 PM,05/Jul/21 10:21 AM,Admin Tool,,,,,0,admintool,admin-tool,internaltool,internaltools,self-test,,,"Given that merchant wants to opt in for favepay cardlink , when bd create a submission on merchant connect , then they are able to opt in cardlink and submit using merchant connect
Normal Case Scenarios - basic flow of the story
* When BD create a new merchant , on the business details page, under fixed fee portion , Cardlink reference section will be there, this is for reference purpose, user cant take action here.
* Cardlink = Yes, when admin tool cardlink indication is tick
* Cardlink = No, when admin tool cardlink indication is untick
* BD onboard a new merchant > opting into cardlink , while clicking on the â€œ+â€ icon on the top right , adding another option â€œ*Add Cardlink*â€
* If its an existing merchant ,naming should be â€œ*Update Cardlink fee*â€
* By clicking into add cardlink or update cardlink , user will land on a creation page
* The Cardlink cashback (% ) will be pre-populated if thereâ€™s already existing favepay cashback >> {color:#ff991f}+Refer to+ {color}{color:#ff991f}+*Alternative Case Scenarios*+{color}
* if not, it will be empty
* By saving this, it should opt in cardlink after its being submitted
* If user update cardlink cashback (% ), the fee will be overwritten by the newly inputted submission.
* There  will be an {{optional Details}} section, its not mandatory for user to input
* In this section, it will show all the outlets, when user click on add info
* A pop up model will appear for user to input Visa MID & Acquirer bin ,
* Visa MID will be unique and acquirer bin can be applies to selected outlet as shown in design.
* Once confirm, the ID will be shown on the option details section.
* The outlet level Visa MID & acquirer Bin act as a field to collect data, information will be pushed to respective outlet once its submitted
*Exception Case Scenarios - unintended flow through the system, error handling*
* User is not able to save without inputting the % , its mandatory field
*Alternative Case Scenarios - success flow/optional flow other than basic flow*
* If BD submitting cardlink for an existing favepay merchant , when bd click into the creation page, *the cardlink cashback (% ) value should be auto-populated*  [~accountid:602b5d0f7fbca20070b65a41]

column1: [MC] Product info : Favepay/Alipay: Add Fixed Fee,FAVE-13576,44614,44613,Sub-task,Closed,FAVE,Fave,software,Azuan Zira Zairein,557058:9ed2af55-7ed4-4d71-9112-86f1860c12d0,,,Medium,Done,Mohamed Zakarya Fekry,5d47d704da0c4d0c789a4541,Katelyn Soo,557058:2f835b06-e18a-42a8-af45-3231fc68d42c,Katelyn Soo,557058:2f835b06-e18a-42a8-af45-3231fc68d42c,08/May/21 2:37 PM,14/Sep/21 11:20 AM,29/Dec/21 5:32 PM,14/Sep/21 11:20 AM,Admin Tool,MC,,,,0,admintool,admin-tool,internaltool,internaltools,,,,"h3. *Given* that merchant would want to opt in favepay or favepay related product, *When* i select favepay/alipay, *Then* i will be able to add favepay, Alipay or Fixed fee.
Normal Case Scenarios - basic flow of the story
* By selecting favepay/alipay, user will be directed to the display page
* On the top right, user able to add new favepay outlet or add fixed fee
* Adding fixed fee will be on merchant level, user only able to add fixed fee once within the submission
* Default yes, when user select No , the files will be hidden.
* All are mandatory fields, if user save without inputting value, error message will prompt
* Once fixed fee is created, fixed fee submission will be display with *Fixed fee effective date & Fixed fee %* , on top of that the add fixed fee button will be disabled.
* Since fixed fee is by merchant level :
Main entity - Fixed fee section will be stagnant appearing on the favepay addendum when contract is generated
Sub-entity - Fixed fee section will be applied to all sub-entity favepay addendum contract.

column1: [MC] Product info : Add Favepay/Alipay,FAVE-13577,44615,44613,Sub-task,Closed,FAVE,Fave,software,Azuan Zira Zairein,557058:9ed2af55-7ed4-4d71-9112-86f1860c12d0,,,Medium,Done,Mohamed Zakarya Fekry,5d47d704da0c4d0c789a4541,Katelyn Soo,557058:2f835b06-e18a-42a8-af45-3231fc68d42c,Katelyn Soo,557058:2f835b06-e18a-42a8-af45-3231fc68d42c,08/May/21 3:55 PM,14/Sep/21 11:21 AM,29/Dec/21 5:32 PM,14/Sep/21 11:21 AM,MC,,,,,0,admintool,admin-tool,internaltool,internaltools,,,,"*Given* that i want to add favepay/Alipay to the submission, *When* i click on Add Favepay outlet, *Then* i should be able to create my favepay/alipay submission.
Normal Case Scenarios - basic flow of the story
Yes- favepay enabled once contract signe dby boh party
No - favepay will not be enable, ops will need to manually toggle

column2: Does merchant accept payment from alipay?

column3: mandatory onlyif alipay is opt in
mandatory onlyif alipay is opt in
mandatory onlyif alipay is opt in
mandatory onlyif alipay is opt in
mandatory onlyif alipay is opt in

column2: section to drag and drop files or choose files

column3: Optional, reflect on favepay dashboard & submission email

column1: *Exception Case Scenarios - unintended flow through the system, error handling*
* User save without filling in mandatory fields , error message will occur
* Adding the Photo & attachments section after alipay details and before others section
* Do not need the photoshoot required field
* Upload file size should be max *10mb* per file
* file uploading on favepay level , will be display onto the favepay dashboard under view details
* Apply to entities /outlets sections, beside the title will have a indication of how many outlets are being selected.

* In this section, will be displaying the main entity at the very top with the total outlets created, following by the individual entities and below it will be the outlet attached to that specific entities.
* This section is a scrollable section so that user have better visibility on whatâ€™s the option and whats being selected
* if user select the main entity checkbox, it will auto select all the outlet created.
* if user select the sub-entity, it will only auto select the outlet belongs to the sub-entity.
* user is also able to select the outlet one by one (if needed).
*Main entity* - all the information will be in the favepay addendum
*Sub-entity* - respective information will be located into the respective favepay addendum contract of that specific sub-entity.
* favepay information created will be used in the contract , and favepay information will also be stagnant in the contract (ie: favepay thats already live)
* Once favepay/alipay created, will be created by outlet as favepay product is by outlet basis
* If user selected schedule favepay , the date will be display , if not will be live upon signing.
* Once all outlet has a favepay created within that submission, the add favepay outlet button will be disable

column3: confirmation pop up, once confirmed will delete the submission

column1: h1. +*Add-on for*+ {color:#ff5630}+*single entity merchant*+{color} +*: favepay creation page*+
* Adding the Photo & attachments section after alipay details and before others section
* Do not need the photoshoot required field
* Upload file size should be max *10mb* per file
* file uploading on favepay level , will be display onto the favepay dashboard under view details

* after clicking back arrow, user will land on eCard display page , that will contains all the eCard created within the submission.

column1: [MC] Submit Merchant,FAVE-13580,44618,,Story,Closed,FAVE,Fave,software,Azuan Zira Zairein,557058:9ed2af55-7ed4-4d71-9112-86f1860c12d0,,,Medium,Done,Mohamed Zakarya Fekry,5d47d704da0c4d0c789a4541,Katelyn Soo,557058:2f835b06-e18a-42a8-af45-3231fc68d42c,Katelyn Soo,557058:2f835b06-e18a-42a8-af45-3231fc68d42c,08/May/21 6:05 PM,14/Sep/21 9:14 AM,29/Dec/21 5:32 PM,14/Sep/21 9:14 AM,Admin Tool,,,,,0,admintool,admin-tool,internaltool,internaltools,,,,"*Given* that iâ€™ve created the submission, *When* I click submit merchant , *Then* there will be a page for me to choose which party i want to contract with.
Normal Case Scenarios - basic flow of the story
* Once submission created , the submit merchant button will be enable, once clicking on to submit merchant, user will be able to choose the signee  either with {{Main entity }}OR {{Sub-entity}}
* User will be directed to contract submission page for signing with main entity

column3: Mall Partnership Agreement upload function will only appear if, the field for mall partnership on main entity info section is *YES* , however this section is optional.

column1: Upload function same as deal or favepay section

column3: showcase the breakdown of the different contract that will be sending to merchant

column2: Signee Details (Hellosign- only applicable to new merchant) - Only applicable to one signee
column3: Signee Name & Signee email address will be *prefilled with the Main contract person & Merchant/owner email info on the Main entity info section, user able to edit if needed.*
user able to cc other emails

column1: * On the top right , there is two icon (1) upload contract , (2) Preview & download contract

column3: *Master Contract (Valid 2 years)* + Opt in product(s) Addendum

column1: h2. +*Main Entity submission after contract sent*+
HelloSign email will sent to both parties
Addendum link will be generated , user able to copy the link and sent to merchant.
* Once addendum link has been acknowledge, an email with the PDF contract will be sent to merchant & BD
By selecting to contract with the Main entity , Business registration information that's being display on the contract will be taking from the Main Entity info section.

column1: [MC] Submit Merchant : Sub entity page,FAVE-13581,44619,44618,Sub-task,Closed,FAVE,Fave,software,Azuan Zira Zairein,557058:9ed2af55-7ed4-4d71-9112-86f1860c12d0,,,Medium,Done,Mohamed Zakarya Fekry,5d47d704da0c4d0c789a4541,Katelyn Soo,557058:2f835b06-e18a-42a8-af45-3231fc68d42c,Katelyn Soo,557058:2f835b06-e18a-42a8-af45-3231fc68d42c,08/May/21 8:08 PM,20/Sep/21 9:44 AM,29/Dec/21 5:32 PM,20/Sep/21 9:44 AM,MC,,,,,0,admintool,admin-tool,internaltool,internaltools,,,,"*Given* that im contracting with the sub-entity, *When* i click on sub-entity, *Then* i will be able to have visibility of the list of sub-entities that will be sending out the contract to.
Normal Case Scenarios - basic flow of the story
* By selecting sub-entity, will direct user to a  page that user can upload mall partnership agreement (if applicable) and the list of entity that will be contracting with.

* Mall Partnership Agreement upload function will only appear if, the field for mall partnership on main entity info section is *YES* , however this section is optional. The upload function logic is the same as deal and favepay section.
* Hubspot ID field will only appear when the profile is being pushed from hubspot
* User able to click into individual sub-entity to view details and input signee information
* In this page, user able to see

column2: Signee Details (Hellosign- only applicable to new merchant) - Only applicable to one signee
column3: Signee Name & Signee email address will be *prefilled with the Main contract person & Merchant/owner email info on the Main entity info section, user able to edit if needed.*
user able to cc other emails
*Master Contract (Valid 2 years)* + Opt in product(s) Addendum

column1: * On the top right of the page,  there is two icon *(1) upload contract , (2) Preview & download contract*
* For upload contract, user able to upload file and save it, then proceed to submit at the outer page.
* If user choose to upload contract
HelloSign email will sent to respective PIC and BD will get multiple hellosign contract
Addendum link will be generated , and auto sent to the merchant.
* Once addendum link has been acknowledge, an email with the PDF contract will be sent to merchant & BD
By selecting to contract with the sub- entity , Business registration information that's being display on respective contract will be taking from the Sub Entity info section.

Fixed Fee: Admin Tool : Merchant Level,FAVE-12699,43490,,Story,Closed,FAVE,Fave,software,Azuan Zira Zairein,557058:9ed2af55-7ed4-4d71-9112-86f1860c12d0,,,Medium,Done,Mohamed Zakarya Fekry,5d47d704da0c4d0c789a4541,Katelyn Soo,557058:2f835b06-e18a-42a8-af45-3231fc68d42c,Katelyn Soo,557058:2f835b06-e18a-42a8-af45-3231fc68d42c,06/Feb/21 1:17 AM,22/Apr/21 2:57 PM,29/Dec/21 5:32 PM,31/Mar/21 10:43 AM,Admin Tool,,,,,0,admintool,internaltools,,,,,,"As a Ops person, i want to be able to edit the fixed fee setting on admin tool, so that if its wrongly configured im able to assist.
Normal Case Scenarios - basic flow of the story
* (1) Tickbox for Fixed fee,  - Indicate that this is a fix fee model merchant
(2) Fix Fee % , a text field that only allow numeric value ,This field indicate the additional percentage being charge for every transaction (Vary merchant to merchant, not standard)

(3) Fix fee effective date , a *calendar* that allows user to select date, and *grey out date before today*  (need to be added/reflected on to the journal system for payment & data team) - allow bd to indicate when will we start charging the additional fee
* Add three field n merchant level, under payment settings
* Once submission comes in to the dashboard this will be auto configure by value inputted by BD.

column1: FLP Payments creation has 2 entry point:
API end-point is handled by grape and can be accessed from below file:
{{app/api/flp/v1/payments.rb}} look for {{desc ""#POST Create an FLP payment""}} you can find something like this, fixed fees if added there will become part of metadata

For reconcilation there is a service called {{app/service/flp_service/reconciliation/create_flp_payment_and_issue_partner_cashback.rb}}  this service will be used when we are backfiling requests missed in reconcilation report.
There you can find something like below:
* Impelement a FLP Calculator for fixed fees caled {{FlpService::Calculator::FixedFees}} responsible for calculating the fees and use it when updating metadata
* Add fixed fees to metadata when FLP Create Payment API called
* Add fixed fees to metadata when {{FlpService::Reconciliation::CreateFlpPaymentAndIssuePartnerCashback}}

* Make sure to update tests to represent changes",,Katelyn Soo,,,,557058:2f835b06-e18a-42a8-af45-3231fc68d42c,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,18/Mar/21 12:27 PM;masoud;image-20210318-041858.png;https://kfit-asia.atlassian.net/secure/attachment/51184/image-20210318-041858.png,18/Mar/21 12:27 PM;masoud;image-20210318-042418.png;https://kfit-asia.atlassian.net/secure/attachment/51185/image-20210318-042418.png,31/Mar/21 11:57 AM;katelyn@myfave.com;image-20210330-042731.png;https://kfit-asia.atlassian.net/secure/attachment/51463/image-20210330-042731.png,,,,,,,,,,,,,All,,,"As a [role] I want [something] so that [value]

Fixed Fee : Merchant Connect : Contract (MY/SG),FAVE-12701,43492,,Story,Closed,FAVE,Fave,software,Azuan Zira Zairein,557058:9ed2af55-7ed4-4d71-9112-86f1860c12d0,,,Medium,Done,Mohamed Zakarya Fekry,5d47d704da0c4d0c789a4541,Katelyn Soo,557058:2f835b06-e18a-42a8-af45-3231fc68d42c,Katelyn Soo,557058:2f835b06-e18a-42a8-af45-3231fc68d42c,06/Feb/21 1:27 AM,22/Apr/21 2:57 PM,29/Dec/21 5:32 PM,31/Mar/21 10:41 AM,Admin Tool,,,,,0,admintool,internaltools,merchant_connect,self-test,,,,"By implementing Fixed fee model, its clauses will need to be included in the *favepay addendum contract* so that BD will not need to signed merchant via paper contract.
Normal Case Scenarios - basic flow of the story
* Section D : Adding a â€œ *** â€ beside Fave Fee and add â€œ ****_equivalent to merchant discount rate (MDR)_* _â€œ_
* Section D : change working to small letter >> *_(tick if applicable)_*
* Add a new â€œ Section E : Fixed Fee Model â€œ
* When BD fill information on merchant connect regarding fixed fee, information will be reflected in this section.
* This applies to *hellosign & preview & download contract*

For the avoidance of doubt, unutilised expired Cashback shall be forfeited to Fave entirely upon its expiry and the Merchant will not have, or be entitled to claim from Fave, any rights and/or interests in respect of such forfeited CashbackÂ {color:#ff5630}unless otherwise specified in {color}{color:#ff5630}*Part I and/or Part III*{color}{color:#ff5630}.   {color}
* Every time a bd opt in to favepay related product , the *Part I and Part II* of the contract addendum need to be *stagnant* there.
* For favepay section , if BD opt in eCard, the latest favepay info will need to show, if change of favpay info, changes will need to reflect.
* Fixed fee, if BD opt in fixed
Part I & II will be stagnant in the contract

One more is existing favepay merchant has 3 favepay outet, in the submission BD create a submission for 1 outlet to change info, in the contract 2 outlet should be still on the existing info, and one outlet will be on the updated info.

Fixed Fee: Merchant Connect : MY/SG ,FAVE-12700,43491,,Story,Closed,FAVE,Fave,software,Azuan Zira Zairein,557058:9ed2af55-7ed4-4d71-9112-86f1860c12d0,,,Medium,Done,Mohamed Zakarya Fekry,5d47d704da0c4d0c789a4541,Katelyn Soo,557058:2f835b06-e18a-42a8-af45-3231fc68d42c,Katelyn Soo,557058:2f835b06-e18a-42a8-af45-3231fc68d42c,06/Feb/21 1:20 AM,22/Apr/21 2:57 PM,29/Dec/21 5:32 PM,01/Apr/21 9:29 AM,Admin Tool,,,,,0,admintool,internaltools,merchant_connect,,,,,As a BD, merchant connect should allow me to onboard merchant with fixed fee, so that it will reflect on the contract and digitalized the process flow.

column1: Normal Case Scenarios - basic flow of the story
* On business merchant creation page , under others add a field for fix fee
* Add â€œ*Is this merchant on fixed fee model? (merchant gets back their breakage)â€ ,* by default this field is always set to â€œNoâ€
* If BD select â€œyesâ€ , it will expand another two field which is *fixed fee (% )* and *fixed fee effective date , both field is* {color:#ff5630}*mandatory*{color} *for BD to input*
* *Fixed fee ( % )* - is a text field that only allow *numeric value*
* *Fixed fee effective date* - is a{{ calendar}}, user only able to select date for today and onwards, {{previous dates will be grey out }}
* These information will be reflected on the *favepay addendum fixed fee section*
* Once submission is signed & submitted , the information will be auto configured on admin tool. (similar to how favepay works currently)
*Alternative Case Scenarios - success flow/optional flow other than basic flow*
PART I: FAVEPAY SUBSCRIPTION FORM (Consist of section A,B,C,D,E)

column5: *Favepay addendum (always consist of Part I & II)*

column2: New Merchant Opt into favepay +Fixed fee

column1: Fixed fee : reflect â€œyesâ€ with relevant information

column2: New Merchant Opt into favepay + No Fixed fee
Existing Merchant new to favepay and fixed fee
Existing merchant already on favepay , opt in to other favepay related product (eCard)
column3: Favepay : should reflect latest favepay information

column1: Fixed fee: should reflect latest information
if yes, the section on contract will be filled
if no, tick no and section wont be filled

Merchant Connect : Existing merchant : Fixed fee product,FAVE-13132,44100,43491,Sub-task,Closed,FAVE,Fave,software,Azuan Zira Zairein,557058:9ed2af55-7ed4-4d71-9112-86f1860c12d0,,,Medium,Done,Hisyam Syazani,602b5d0f7fbca20070b65a41,Katelyn Soo,557058:2f835b06-e18a-42a8-af45-3231fc68d42c,Katelyn Soo,557058:2f835b06-e18a-42a8-af45-3231fc68d42c,22/Mar/21 6:24 PM,22/Apr/21 2:57 PM,29/Dec/21 5:32 PM,31/Mar/21 10:44 AM,Admin Tool,,,,,0,admintool,internaltools,merchant_connect,self-test,,,,As a BD, if i want to add fixed fee or change fixed fee information for an existing merchant, i will need to go through the submission form.

column1: *Normal Case Scenarios - basic flow of the story*
* BD land on Fave Products page > click on favepay > land on the display page > on the plus button adding in ad additional â€œAdd fixed feeâ€ section, fixed fee can only be added once.
* button for fixed fee will be dynamically change if thereâ€™s already a live fixed fee , button show â€œ*edit fixed fee*â€ if no fixed fee, button show â€œ*Add fixed fee*â€
* once fixed fee is created, the button will be grey out, and if BD delete the creation , the button will be enable.
* by clicking  add / edit fixed fee , BD will land on a form
* which state three fields {{(1) enable fixed fee question (by default is yes), (2) Fixed fee % (3) fixed fee effective date}} , all 3 fields are *mandatory*
* If BD Opt out as â€œnoâ€ , the additional 2 fields will be hidden ? BD can proceed to save,
* Once fixed fee is created, fixed fee will be display on the favepay page, displaying the *(1) Fixed fee effective date (2) Fixed fee(%)*
* On the *action* column for fixed fee , BD able to *(1) edit*  (to make amendments), *(2) delete* (remove from submission)
* If its a â€œNoâ€ , fixed fee effective date = N/A , Fixed fee ( % ) = Disable Fixed Fee
*Exception Case Scenarios - unintended flow through the system, error handling*
* if its a â€œyesâ€ , BD try to save without the other mandatory fields , error will appear
* Based on the information inputted in the form , it will reflect on favepay addendum Part I section E

* For contract , if thereâ€™s no form created in the submission, it will follow the information on the merchant level , but if a form created for fixed fee, the new information will be reflected on the contract

* after the form is created and reflected on the contract ,  contract will be sent to merchant to acknowledge, once the submission is submitted (using addendum link or paper contract) , the updated information will then reflect on admin tool with log.
* if the submission that contain fixed fee, when BD edit & resubmit the favepay, should be able to see the fixed fee portion as well

Fixed Fee : Merchant payout : Favepay excel & SOA,FAVE-12702,43493,,Story,Closed,FAVE,Fave,software,Azuan Zira Zairein,557058:9ed2af55-7ed4-4d71-9112-86f1860c12d0,,,Medium,Done,Nicholas Wong,5e9d43ad61f0e70c112536db,Katelyn Soo,557058:2f835b06-e18a-42a8-af45-3231fc68d42c,Katelyn Soo,557058:2f835b06-e18a-42a8-af45-3231fc68d42c,06/Feb/21 1:29 AM,22/Apr/21 2:57 PM,29/Dec/21 5:32 PM,31/Mar/21 3:06 PM,Admin Tool,,,,,0,admintool,internaltools,merchant-payment,self-test,,,,"As a Merchant that opt in for fixed fee model, i want to be able to see my break down of fixed fee amount by transaction as well as a summary of how much is being return to me on the SOA.
As a internal user, i should be able to extract favepay excel and SOA that consist of fixed fee breakdown information so that im able to easily assist merchant(s).
*Normal Case Scenarios - basic flow of the story*
h2. *Favepay Excel to include fixed Fee*
* Adding Fixed fee ( % ) and Fixed fees column in order to indicate the % and the amount
* by adding fixed fee , changes the calculation on Total Fees, SST on Total Fees and merchant takeback

* Adding another â€œBreakageâ€ tab on favepay excel , this tab will list out all expired cashback with information such as :  *User ID, Outlet, Receipt ID, Merchant cashback issued date, merchant cashback un-use amount  and merchant cashback expired date*
* Adding additional line under favepay section name : *Breakage Return* , this will show the sum amount that of expired cashback (breakage) that needed to be pay back to merchant.
* Add an additional line on Note to explain on Breakage Return in order to avoid merchant confusion
# Breakage flag and fixed fee % should be company level to eliminate merchant cb breakage calculation and distribution issues.
# Additionally breakage flag should be added in transactions: details column.

# The calculated fixed fee amount and fave fees amount should be added in fave_payments and flp_payments: transaction_details column. Calculation *Fixed Fee =Â (BillÂ Amount (keyed in amount)Â - Merchant Cashback Used AmountÂ - eCard Credit Used) * Fixed Fee Percentage*
h2. Fixed fee information on SOA & Breakage tab will based on logic as below:
* whether is there is fixed fee breakage payout needed

Admin tool : malaysia outlet : Favepay Fave fee effective date,FAVE-12666,43449,,Story,Closed,FAVE,Fave,software,Azuan Zira Zairein,557058:9ed2af55-7ed4-4d71-9112-86f1860c12d0,,,Highest,Done,Mohamed Zakarya Fekry,5d47d704da0c4d0c789a4541,Katelyn Soo,557058:2f835b06-e18a-42a8-af45-3231fc68d42c,Katelyn Soo,557058:2f835b06-e18a-42a8-af45-3231fc68d42c,29/Jan/21 11:36 AM,22/Apr/21 2:57 PM,29/Dec/21 5:32 PM,09/Feb/21 6:04 PM,Admin Tool,,,,,0,admintool,internaltools,,,,,,"*Context :* business team having thisÂ *MY commercial plan for 2021, we are providing MDR waiver for all Favepay merchants, Campaign period from 1st Feb - 28Feb 2021,*Â objective is to get merchant to push Fave during MCO vs other platform
*What need to be done:* Mass update the fave effective date to 1st March 2021 on 31st Jan , 12am
Create, test and deploy the script today (with a schedule function that will perform on 31 Jan , 12am), hence will need to break the code freeze today.
* a list of outlet ID will be provided in order to update the fave effective date

MC : Product creation : Assign all outlet,FAVE-12526,43260,,Story,Backlog,FAVE,Fave,software,Azuan Zira Zairein,557058:9ed2af55-7ed4-4d71-9112-86f1860c12d0,,,Medium,,,,Katelyn Soo,557058:2f835b06-e18a-42a8-af45-3231fc68d42c,Katelyn Soo,557058:2f835b06-e18a-42a8-af45-3231fc68d42c,08/Jan/21 11:30 AM,22/Apr/21 2:57 PM,29/Dec/21 5:32 PM,,Admin Tool,,,,,0,admintool,internaltools,,,,,,"As a BD, i want to be able to have an option to assign all active outlets so that i do not need to waste time tagging it one by one if there's multiple outlet.
*Normal Case Scenarios - basic flow of the story*
* Under *Favepay & deal* product creation under â€œ*apply to outlets*â€ section, user should have the option to tagged â€œ*All Outlets*â€.
* {{All outlets }}will be representing outlets which are *outlet status = active*

* once user tagged â€œAll outletsâ€ , system should auto tagged all the outlets under this field individually.  For example : Profile Fave has 10 outlet, when BD tagged all outlets to the deals, individual outlet name will be auto  tagged under this field.
*Alternative Case Scenarios - success flow/optional flow other than basic flow*

* Specifically to *Favepay ,* when user creating a favepay submission , the outlet will need to be validated with two information: - Outlet status = active and if outlet which already tagged on other draft favepay within that submission should not be appearing as well.

* if outlet only left One, that technically â€œAll Outletsâ€ should not show.",,Katelyn Soo,,,,557058:2f835b06-e18a-42a8-af45-3231fc68d42c,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,08/Jan/21 2:39 PM;katelyn@myfave.com;image-20210108-033022.png;https://kfit-asia.atlassian.net/secure/attachment/49823/image-20210108-033022.png,,,,,,,,,,,,,"We want SPECIFIC examples you can use the GHERKIN https://docs.cucumber.io/gherkin/reference/

column1: Fave Deals with 7 digit receipt ID, not found on AT,FAVE-12647,43407,,Task,Closed,FAVE,Fave,software,Azuan Zira Zairein,557058:9ed2af55-7ed4-4d71-9112-86f1860c12d0,,,High,Done,Ren DG,557058:0f7200b8-796f-42d0-8c94-9aa926f002c0,Andrew Chin,5fb29867d670b8006e5adf16,Andrew Chin,5fb29867d670b8006e5adf16,25/Jan/21 4:23 PM,22/Apr/21 2:57 PM,29/Dec/21 5:32 PM,27/Jan/21 9:54 AM,Admin Tool,,,,,0,adhoc,admintool,ch-escalate,payments,,,,"+*Context*+
CH detected several tickets this year where the user escalated the following:
# User purchased a Fave Deal in SG but the deal shows an odd 7-digit schema for the receipt which is outside our norm.
# Transaction is not recorded in the payment history on consumer app.
# Voucher purchase is not found inside the AT records by CH
# Transaction was found on the Adyen portal but reversing the search using PSP reference, there are still no results on AT.
# Consumer behaviour mapping also seems off; Clevertap detected a {{charged}} event at 3:10AM but transaction was performed at 3:00AM recorded on AT.
For further information, please click on the 2 slack escalations made:
CH is not able to track these transactions efficiently. Especially if these are sensitive time-bound refund escalations. 2 cases alone have happened in the last 3 weeks of January 2021.
[~accountid:557058:faad2d03-058e-4ab4-a282-e9c3543f9e39] advised we need engineering effort to investigate as PMs has no access to production db. Expectation is to do the following:
# Investigate why the transactions are creating 7-digit receipt IDs
# Investigate the linkage on why Adyen would track the transaction but not AT

column3: i01k0e:e,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,Magma,,,,2021-01-26 02:49:46.994,25/Jan/21 4:32 PM;5fb29867d670b8006e5adf16;[~accountid:557058:faad2d03-058e-4ab4-a282-e9c3543f9e39] feel free to add any other expectations on the outcome of the investigation we wanna achieve. Escalating it to {{high}} to indicate issue importance compared to other adhoc backlog,26/Jan/21 10:49 AM;557058:0f7200b8-796f-42d0-8c94-9aa926f002c0;[~accountid:557058:174b35c3-38b4-4055-b3de-d8c8e41a3a7c] anything you can add for context regarding this issue?,26/Jan/21 10:55 AM;557058:0f7200b8-796f-42d0-8c94-9aa926f002c0;I think the starting point is in [https://github.com/kfit-dev/kfit-app/blob/5a90d87881681be44635ab4a2133dde6d26e08b4/app/models/transaction.rb#L469

column7: smart-link] ,"26/Jan/21 11:02 AM;557058:174b35c3-38b4-4055-b3de-d8c8e41a3a7c;it looks like the issue is when we serialize it, not in the transaction.",26/Jan/21 11:42 AM;557058:0f7200b8-796f-42d0-8c94-9aa926f002c0;some discussion - [https://myfave.slack.com/archives/G7WND5DEC/p1611629925021400

column1: Investigation result: ok it's not fraud, when receipt id is null, we show the eagle_reservation id as the receipt id on mobile side.
propose to just add more logging and datadog tracking for that API and send an alarm when it happens again on two places
# when we create transaction and receipt id is nil
# when reservation api is called and the reservation.receipt id is nil

as for PMs lets workout SOP for cases of receipt id is 7 characters. They need to go to the user's reservations and verify if the receipt id matches any of the reservation id for further action.","27/Jan/21 3:08 PM;5fb29867d670b8006e5adf16;acknowledge, have communicated the SOP to the CH team in the mean time.",,,,,Done

column1: Fixed fee : Implementation in the Payment flow,FAVE-12584,43333,,Story,Cancelled,FAVE,Fave,software,Azuan Zira Zairein,557058:9ed2af55-7ed4-4d71-9112-86f1860c12d0,,,Medium,Duplicate,,,Phung Hank,557058:174b35c3-38b4-4055-b3de-d8c8e41a3a7c,Phung Hank,557058:174b35c3-38b4-4055-b3de-d8c8e41a3a7c,15/Jan/21 11:44 AM,22/Apr/21 2:57 PM,29/Dec/21 5:32 PM,01/Apr/21 9:49 AM,Admin Tool,,,,,0,admintool,internaltools,,,,,,"1) Breakage flag and fixed fee % should be company level to eliminate merchant cb breakage calculation and distribution issues.
2) Additionally breakage flag should be added in transaction.details column of the cashback transaction.
3) The calculated fixed fee amount and fave fees amount should be added in the fave_payments and flp_payments: transaction_details column. Fave fee formula is given here:
Fave Fee = (Bill Amount (keyed in amount) - Merchant Cashback Used Amount - eCard Credit Used) * Fave Fee Percentage

,,Katelyn Soo,Phung Hank,,,557058:2f835b06-e18a-42a8-af45-3231fc68d42c,557058:174b35c3-38b4-4055-b3de-d8c8e41a3a7c,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,We want SPECIFIC examples you can use the GHERKIN https://docs.cucumber.io/gherkin/reference/
Then WE EXPECT SOMETHING SPECIFIC",,All,,,"1) Breakage flag and fixed fee % should be company level to eliminate merchant cb breakage calculation and distribution issues.
2) Additionally breakage flag should be added in transaction.details column of the cashback transaction.
3) The calculated fixed fee amount and fave fees amount should be added in the fave_payments and flp_payments: transaction_details column. Fave fee formula is given here:
Fave Fee = (Bill Amount (keyed in amount) - Merchant Cashback Used Amount - eCard Credit Used) * Fave Fee Percentage

Add additional query field using order_id in Reseller Order Status,FAVE-13107,44068,,Task,Closed,FAVE,Fave,software,Azuan Zira Zairein,557058:9ed2af55-7ed4-4d71-9112-86f1860c12d0,,,Medium,Done,Daryll Tumambing,5fa01681b2633d00763404d3,Andrew Chin,5fb29867d670b8006e5adf16,Andrew Chin,5fb29867d670b8006e5adf16,18/Mar/21 3:41 PM,22/Apr/21 2:58 PM,29/Dec/21 5:32 PM,06/Apr/21 3:18 PM,Admin Tool,,,,,0,admintool,marketplace,payments,skip_tip,,,,"+*Context*+

Referencing the conversation above & the reseller order status query module, [~accountid:557058:174b35c3-38b4-4055-b3de-d8c8e41a3a7c] had explained that this function of Admin Tool only works for Shell & Lazada resellers that provide us pregenerated codes & can be queried using field {{order_number}}. This does not work exactly for Marketplace resellers which uses {{order_id}}.

In our conversation with UOB, it had been remarked as (though actually optional) preferable for them as a reseller to send us the field {{order_id}}. We had advised them to send this field (which will be their native app transaction reference, 16 digits) in this field for us to receive it via Marketplace.

This was pitched to them to adopt as a â€œPlan Bâ€ escalation approach (otherwise they would have said no to the additional work) if say, a user files a complaint on their Fave Deal purchase via UOB Mighty App since;
# UOB will not be sending us any identifying information about the user via the marketplace request but use a representative/dummy PII data
# The web-receipt enhancement which will show the receipt ID is also (at this point of time) still developing & UOB mentioned that the accessibility to this receipt is not straightforward.
Enhance the Admin Tool to have an additional query parameter for {{order_id}} (Search by Order ID for Marketplace) on the reseller order status query.
This new query param needs to work together with the {{city_slug}} (Select City)
Previous work referenced for this query module: [https://github.com/kfit-dev/kfit-app/pull/4967
{quote}so base from the github we have a concept ofÂ {{ResellerOrderTracker}}Â where you can search by order number
here are the info we can get in that model:{quote}
From our FAQ this is what we have on {{resellerCode}}
* When required to extract details from resellers (Akulaku, Tokopedia, Ovo etc). We save external order ids in the ResellerCode model, order_id column.Â
* Voucher web redemption url. To obtain the redemption url link, use the model method redeem_url of the Reseller Code model. Use the city slug as a parameter.

# Upgrade the tool to support searching of marketplace ResellerOrderTracker#id and ResellerOrderTracker#reseller_order_id",,Andrew Chin,Daryll Tumambing,,,5fb29867d670b8006e5adf16,5fa01681b2633d00763404d3,,,,,,,,,,,,,FAVE-13229,,,,26/Mar/21 10:38 AM;renlester;image-20210326-023743.png;https://kfit-asia.atlassian.net/secure/attachment/51353/image-20210326-023743.png,26/Mar/21 10:39 AM;ug:125492ee-7291-4c24-861f-66c0d5f3e00f;image-20210326-023908.png;https://kfit-asia.atlassian.net/secure/attachment/51354/image-20210326-023908.png,,,,,,,,,,,,,,All,,,,"{pullrequest={dataType=pullrequest, state=MERGED, stateCount=1}, json={""cachedValue"":{""errors"":[],""summary"":{""pullrequest"":{""overall"":{""count"":1,""lastUpdated"":""2021-04-06T14:49:56.000+0800"",""stateCount"":1,""state"":""MERGED"",""open"":false,""dataType"":""pullrequest""},""byInstanceType"":{""GitHub"":{""count"":1,""name"":""GitHub""}}}}},""isStale"":true}}",Ren DG,557058:0f7200b8-796f-42d0-8c94-9aa926f002c0,,FAVE-12149,,,,,,,,Andrew Chin,5fb29867d670b8006e5adf16,,Sarah Mohammed,557058:40cc948d-ee61-484b-91b9-8dd55984d9c3,1

MC : Deal addendum Contract : Guarantee fee & FD Extension clause ,FAVE-12703,43494,,Story,Closed,FAVE,Fave,software,Azuan Zira Zairein,557058:9ed2af55-7ed4-4d71-9112-86f1860c12d0,,,Medium,Done,Hisyam Syazani,602b5d0f7fbca20070b65a41,Katelyn Soo,557058:2f835b06-e18a-42a8-af45-3231fc68d42c,Katelyn Soo,557058:2f835b06-e18a-42a8-af45-3231fc68d42c,06/Feb/21 1:52 AM,22/Apr/21 2:57 PM,29/Dec/21 5:32 PM,08/Mar/21 10:58 AM,Admin Tool,,,,,0,admintool,internaltools,merchant_connect,,,,,"As a BD, when i generate +*_deal addendum contract_*+ on using hellosign, or preview/download function, contract should be updated with Guarantee fee & FD Extension clause.
Normal Case Scenarios - basic flow of the story
* Changes will be applied to *all three countries deal addendum contract* and will be indicated in red for better clarity
* Section D : fave sell price* column  add *_(excluding Fave Guarantee Fee)*_*
* Section D : merchant takeback column , Replace ** with *****
* Section D : Under paragraph , replace fave sell price with *final selling price*
* Section D : Under paragraph , Replace ** with *****
* *Section G : Under the box add clause as below:*

*The Parties agree that upon mutual agreement between the Parties, an Authorised Representative of the Merchant listed in Section A, may amend the Merchant Offering details in Section D, Section E, Section F and/or Section G, including but not limited to, amendments on deal details, extension of agreed feature period and so on via notice in writing (including via email).*
* TNC should start in a new page instead of the same page.
* For Indonesia Version, there will be english & bahasa
* Only basaha version needed to add an additional change on the paragraph which is *â€œ di platform*â€  as show in the image

MC : Contract Migration : Hide favelink for BD Role,FAVE-12672,43460,,Story,Closed,FAVE,Fave,software,Azuan Zira Zairein,557058:9ed2af55-7ed4-4d71-9112-86f1860c12d0,,,Medium,Done,Hisyam Syazani,602b5d0f7fbca20070b65a41,Katelyn Soo,557058:2f835b06-e18a-42a8-af45-3231fc68d42c,Katelyn Soo,557058:2f835b06-e18a-42a8-af45-3231fc68d42c,02/Feb/21 12:05 PM,22/Apr/21 2:57 PM,29/Dec/21 5:32 PM,24/Feb/21 2:17 PM,Admin Tool,,,,,0,admintool,internaltools,merchant_connect,,,,,"As a BD, when i generate master contract, i should not be able to see the favelink option so that i wont use that method to sign merchant.

Backend : RPP(MY) : Sent reminder email ,FAVE-12992,43873,,Story,Closed,FAVE,Fave,software,Azuan Zira Zairein,557058:9ed2af55-7ed4-4d71-9112-86f1860c12d0,,,Medium,Done,Hisyam Syazani,602b5d0f7fbca20070b65a41,Katelyn Soo,557058:2f835b06-e18a-42a8-af45-3231fc68d42c,Katelyn Soo,557058:2f835b06-e18a-42a8-af45-3231fc68d42c,08/Mar/21 11:17 AM,03/Aug/21 9:35 AM,29/Dec/21 5:32 PM,16/Mar/21 10:05 AM,Admin Tool,,,,,0,admintool,internaltools,RPP_link,,,,,As a active favepay merchant, if i have yet to submit the required documents, there will be a email reminder so that it can nudge me to upload my documents.

column1: *Normal Case Scenarios - basic flow of the story*
* Email reminder ,depending when its launch, it will be trigger on a weekly basis for continuously 6 week, and following week will be a bi-weekly trigger *(two week once)*
* Email remainder will only be sent to active favepay merchant that has status link = pending
* the reminder can be switch off using flipper
* Validation needed :  (1) Check whether is active favepay merchant (run through all the outlet weather is there favepay enable) , (2) link status = pending > if yes - sent reminder
* If mid way wanted to add in to the merchant list, we should be able to add in the merchant ID

* If merchant id added half way of the reminder, it will follow the existing process and will not reset to go through the whole cycle. Eg: we sent out 2 reminder , and  3rd week we added a merchant , hence the merchant will received 4 weekly reminder > bi-weekly reminder until we switch it off

column1: Bug : Merchant Connect : Rails 5 ,FAVE-13257,44316,,Task,Closed,FAVE,Fave,software,Azuan Zira Zairein,557058:9ed2af55-7ed4-4d71-9112-86f1860c12d0,,,Medium,Done,Hisyam Syazani,602b5d0f7fbca20070b65a41,Katelyn Soo,557058:2f835b06-e18a-42a8-af45-3231fc68d42c,Katelyn Soo,557058:2f835b06-e18a-42a8-af45-3231fc68d42c,12/Apr/21 10:02 AM,27/Apr/21 10:17 AM,29/Dec/21 5:32 PM,27/Apr/21 10:17 AM,Admin Tool,,,,,0,admintool,internaltools,,,,,,"Steps To Reproduce (STR):

[Admin Tool] Fix admin tool favebiz manager add company layout and optimize company selection,FAVE-13533,44567,,Task,Closed,FAVE,Fave,software,Azuan Zira Zairein,557058:9ed2af55-7ed4-4d71-9112-86f1860c12d0,,,Medium,Done,Ziyun Tan,5cf4c342623cba0f42dfee38,Ziyun Tan,5cf4c342623cba0f42dfee38,Ziyun Tan,5cf4c342623cba0f42dfee38,04/May/21 3:16 PM,06/May/21 3:00 PM,29/Dec/21 5:32 PM,06/May/21 3:00 PM,,,,,,0,admintool,admin-tool,,,,,,"*Context:*
Currently when try to add/edit company for favebiz manager the company select field and button had exceed the modal pop up.

The company list dropdown selection are loading and showing all available company list in our system so we need to wait for the list to load slowly and it will become slower in the future when we add more companies.

2. Allow user to type and search company using company id or name to select the company instead of load all company list in the dropdown.

[MC] Multiple Entities Contract Epic,FAVE-13554,44591,,Epic,Development In Progress,FAVE,Fave,software,Azuan Zira Zairein,557058:9ed2af55-7ed4-4d71-9112-86f1860c12d0,,,Medium,,,,Katelyn Soo,557058:2f835b06-e18a-42a8-af45-3231fc68d42c,Katelyn Soo,557058:2f835b06-e18a-42a8-af45-3231fc68d42c,06/May/21 11:05 PM,03/Nov/21 1:34 PM,09/Dec/21 10:30 AM,,Admin Tool,Backend,Frontend,MC,,0,admintool,admin-tool,internaltool,internaltools,,,,When i have a multiple entity merchant(s), I want to submit contract and get contract digitally sent via merchant connect, so i can spent my time working on other tasks.

column1: Normal Case Scenarios - basic flow of the story
* *Given* that onboarding a new merchant, *When* i click on Add new merchant, *Then* i have the option to choose â€œsingle entityâ€ Or Multiple entity
* *Given* that selecting â€œMultiple entityâ€ option , *When* i go through the submission flow *Then* there will be an additional section name â€œSub-entity infoâ€

* *Given* the business details page on Main entity info section will have an indication whether is this a mall partnership, *When* chosen option as yes *Then* will trigger the function to upload Mall agreement on the contract submission page (submit merchant).
* *Given* on the sub-entity info creation page, *When* chosen yes (same business information) , *Then* official & merchant details will be auto-populated.
* *Given* on the bank account info section, *When* i create a bank account, *Then* should have a dropdown of entity for me to choose and pre-filled the business details.
* *Given* on the Outlet info section, *When* i create an outlet, *Then* should have a entity section to link entity with the outlet.
* *Given* by adding favepay/alipay or deal product, *When* i create submission, *Then* i should be able to upload attachment and image & able to easily select outlets.
* *Given* that after creating my submission for SG/ID & Non RPP merchant , *When* i click on submit i merchant, *Then* i should be able to choose i want to contract with Main entity or sub-entity.
* *Given* that chosen to contract with â€œsub-entityâ€, *When* i click into â€œsub-entity, *Then* i should be able to see a list of sub-entity that i created with a product submission.
* *Given* that for sub-entity new merchant creation , *When* i sent contract via hellosign, *Then* the contract will be sent to respective entity PIC.
* *Given* that sub-entity existing merchant creation, *When* i sent contract via addendum link, *Then* the contract will automatically sent to respective entity PIC.
* *Given* the multiple entity submission has been submitted , *when* i click on â€œMy submissionâ€, *Then* im able to differentiate the submission for main entity or sub-entity.

* *Given* that submission for an RPP merchant on Malaysia, *When* i created a favepay, *Then* RPP upload documents will pop up , depending on submitting for main or sub entity it will direct to different section, If i want to submit later, a sticky banner will be on the top of the page.
* *Given* storing the contract and RPP documents on admin tool, *When* i click on â€œsub-entitiesâ€ on merchant level. *Then* im able to see the respective documents and able to edit entities info.

column1: [Admin Tool] Merchant credit Dashboard: usage page,FAVE-13706,44756,,Story,Closed,FAVE,Fave,software,Azuan Zira Zairein,557058:9ed2af55-7ed4-4d71-9112-86f1860c12d0,,,Medium,Done,Alex Safian,60f51e529f975e0069a42c9d,Katelyn Soo,557058:2f835b06-e18a-42a8-af45-3231fc68d42c,Katelyn Soo,557058:2f835b06-e18a-42a8-af45-3231fc68d42c,28/May/21 1:14 PM,27/Dec/21 11:56 AM,28/Dec/21 12:04 PM,27/Dec/21 11:56 AM,Admin Tool,,,,,0,admintool,admin-tool,internaltool,internaltools,,,,"*Given that* user need to find details on merchant credit dashboard , *When* user click into usage on the merchant credit transaction, *then* it will show the full transaction on when customer gain the amount of cashback.
*Normal Case Scenarios - basic flow of the story*
* By clicking into usage > it will lead user to the specific transaction (whole transaction that's related to the specific cashback)
* Every entry , will show the whole group transaction and able to expand the transaction to see the full breakdown.

(11) [BE - MC] : Favepay Dashboard + Submission email,FAVE-14592,45790,,Story,Closed,FAVE,Fave,software,Azuan Zira Zairein,557058:9ed2af55-7ed4-4d71-9112-86f1860c12d0,,,Medium,Done,Hisyam Syazani,602b5d0f7fbca20070b65a41,Katelyn Soo,557058:2f835b06-e18a-42a8-af45-3231fc68d42c,Katelyn Soo,557058:2f835b06-e18a-42a8-af45-3231fc68d42c,25/Jul/21 12:27 AM,09/Sep/21 10:44 AM,29/Dec/21 5:32 PM,09/Sep/21 10:04 AM,Admin Tool,,,,,0,admintool,admin-tool,internaltool,internaltools,,,,"*Given that* Once user submitted a merchant with FPL, *When* Both party signed or addendum link being acknowledge, *Then* a submission email will trigger to ops team and submission will enter the favepay dashboard.
Normal Case Scenarios - basic flow of the story
* On the submission email , will need to add a \[FavePay Later] indication if thereâ€™s FPL submission
* In the email content will need to indicate FPL details
* Standardized all comment to sales from all product submission to *Remark to ops* in submission email.
* Id merchant signed addendum link, there will be an email with the PDF contract sent to merchant & BD.
* Adding an additional Colum â€œ*FP Later Submitted*â€ on Favepay live dashboard before favepay status
* FP Later submitted = *Y* , meaning in the submission thereâ€™s FPL created
* FP Later submitted = *N* , meaning in the submission thereâ€™s NO FPL
* Under View details , will have an additional FPL Remark to ops box, this will reflect the remark user inputted on the Remark to ops on the FPL creation page on MC.
* This box will only appear if the submission has FPL, If no will be hidden.
* FPL + FP needs to be submitted together , hence, on the dashboard  FP Later Submitted = Yes, Favepay Status = FP enabled on outlet , and the FPL remark box will display.
* FPL can be submitted as a stand alone product, hence status for *FP Later Submitted* will be *Yes* and *FP* will depending on the current live status*, FPL remark box will be shown.*
* To have log , for future debugging.
* If user cancel the submission with FP Later
> The FP Later status will be inactive
>BD able to edit & resubmit on MC

(8) [BE - MC] Submit Merchant + Digital Contract + Add FPL Contract,FAVE-14587,45785,,Story,Closed,FAVE,Fave,software,Azuan Zira Zairein,557058:9ed2af55-7ed4-4d71-9112-86f1860c12d0,,,Medium,Done,Hisyam Syazani,602b5d0f7fbca20070b65a41,Katelyn Soo,557058:2f835b06-e18a-42a8-af45-3231fc68d42c,Katelyn Soo,557058:2f835b06-e18a-42a8-af45-3231fc68d42c,24/Jul/21 8:35 PM,09/Sep/21 9:23 AM,29/Dec/21 5:32 PM,09/Sep/21 9:23 AM,Admin Tool,,,,,0,admintool,admin-tool,internaltool,internaltools,,,,"*Given That* user submitting FPL for a new merchant , *When* user created FPL, *Then* user will need to create favepay submission together in order to submit merchant.
Normal Case Scenarios - basic flow of the story
* For new merchant or existing merchant never opt in to favepay before , *will need to have favepay submission togethe*r in order to submit.
* For Existing Favepay merchant , *user able to submit merchant without any favepay submission*
* Once user click on submit merchant , will land on Digital contract & addendum(s) Page , Favepay Later addendum will be one of the option under submission details
* Add Remark for favepay later, will reflect on Other remark section on FPL
> User Opt in to favepay later, the section will be shown under *Part III of favepay addendum*
> Contract will *default show 2 model* , hybrid model will only show on contract if its being selected.
> contract will need to accommodate for *hellosign, addendum link* and *Preview & download function*

[Admin tool ] Deal status logic,FAVE-15060,46316,,Story,Backlog,FAVE,Fave,software,Azuan Zira Zairein,557058:9ed2af55-7ed4-4d71-9112-86f1860c12d0,,,Medium,,,,Katelyn Soo,557058:2f835b06-e18a-42a8-af45-3231fc68d42c,Katelyn Soo,557058:2f835b06-e18a-42a8-af45-3231fc68d42c,23/Aug/21 12:25 PM,14/Dec/21 9:17 AM,29/Dec/21 5:32 PM,,Admin Tool,MC,,,,0,admintool,admin-tool,internaltool,internaltools,,,,"Given that , a live deal, when it hits the feature end date and the redemption end date , then it will automatically change the deal status to ""inactive""

- Without redemption period + feature end date ended > switch to inactive
- Without feature & redemption period > status switch to inactive

* On My submission section add another tab name â€œ FavePay Laterâ€ after eCard
* User able to filter submission, but by default will show â€œAll submissionâ€
* Table consist of *Submission Date , Merchant Name , Fee Model , Submission Status* and *Actions*

column1: [Admin Tool] : Admin user page,FAVE-15748,47199,,Story,Ready to Develop,FAVE,Fave,software,Azuan Zira Zairein,557058:9ed2af55-7ed4-4d71-9112-86f1860c12d0,,,Medium,,Hisyam Syazani,602b5d0f7fbca20070b65a41,Katelyn Soo,557058:2f835b06-e18a-42a8-af45-3231fc68d42c,Katelyn Soo,557058:2f835b06-e18a-42a8-af45-3231fc68d42c,07/Oct/21 10:24 PM,14/Dec/21 9:17 AM,29/Dec/21 5:32 PM,,Admin Tool,MC,,,,0,admintool,admin-tool,internaltool,internaltools,,,,"Given that , When BD join fave, user officer will grant access and opt in which product the bd is in charge. This is for reference to display on merchant connect.
* When super admin grant access , super admin able to grant product access to BDs role as well
* Product permission only affect merchant connect access, hence only will appear when role being assigned to BD manager, BD intermediate, BD associate, engineering & Super admin.
* The admin tool configuration will be display exactly on MC. eg: If one BD being tagged to all product, BD email will be display on all.
* Products : *Favepay/Alipay/Fixed fee , Favepay Later, Deals, ecards, favepay cardlink , Favepay Online*
* Show only product list for bd lead and normal form for super admin:
- Open admin user page to BD leads role, however will be showing only the product permission

[Bug]  FP upload image on Single & MEC flow not working properly,FAVE-15427,46781,,Bug,Closed,FAVE,Fave,software,Azuan Zira Zairein,557058:9ed2af55-7ed4-4d71-9112-86f1860c12d0,,,Medium,Done,Mohamed Zakarya Fekry,5d47d704da0c4d0c789a4541,Katelyn Soo,557058:2f835b06-e18a-42a8-af45-3231fc68d42c,Katelyn Soo,557058:2f835b06-e18a-42a8-af45-3231fc68d42c,14/Sep/21 6:02 PM,18/Nov/21 4:21 PM,29/Dec/21 5:32 PM,18/Nov/21 4:21 PM,Admin Tool,MC,,,,0,admintool,admin-tool,internaltool,internaltools,,,,"Given that, user will need to upload logo or images for favepay submission, when they land on FP creation page , Then will see the function to upload images that will be brought over to ops in the dashboard.
* Upload file size should be max *10mb* per file
* when BD uploaded an image , the indication of image being successfully uploaded should stay and should not go missing.
* when BD created a deal with images attached during creation flow, when BD re-edit, even image is there in the backend, the indication should still be there.
* *Remove function to be as per stated below:*
** *Scenario 1:* when bd uploaded attachment > save > re-edit the upload page
- for this case, BD can remove attachment one by one
** *Scenario 2*: when BD uploaded attachment, on the same page before saving.
- for this case, if user want to remove, will be removing all uploaded attachment and re-upload all again
** *Scenario 3*: when BD uploaded attachment, re-edit to upload more

- for such case is a combination of Scenario *1 & 2*, so it will create *two section* for same document upload, user will be able to see the *previous uploaded attachment*, following up the *upload button* at the bottom of the section
** When user delete attachment , there will be a confirmation pop up
** there will be a cross button for bd to remove attachment
* This function applies to *Single & Multiple entities*
- attachment will be attach on to favepay dashboard.

- for such case is a combination of Scenario *1 & 2*, so it will create *two section* for same document upload, user will be able to see the *previous uploaded attachment*, following up the *upload button* at the bottom of the section

[MC] Handle deleted and inactive outlet ,FAVE-15830,47305,,Story,Closed,FAVE,Fave,software,Azuan Zira Zairein,557058:9ed2af55-7ed4-4d71-9112-86f1860c12d0,,,Medium,Done,Hisyam Syazani,602b5d0f7fbca20070b65a41,Katelyn Soo,557058:2f835b06-e18a-42a8-af45-3231fc68d42c,Katelyn Soo,557058:2f835b06-e18a-42a8-af45-3231fc68d42c,14/Oct/21 9:03 PM,27/Oct/21 2:34 PM,09/Dec/21 10:48 AM,27/Oct/21 2:34 PM,Admin Tool,MC,,,,0,admintool,admin-tool,internaltool,internaltools,,,,"Given that if the merchant profile consist of inactive or deleted outlet, when user create a outlet level product like favepay and deal , then the deleted or inactive outlet selection will not appear.
* Ensure all inactive outlet or deleted outlet should not appear on outlet selection during product creation page.

column1: Admin Tool : Unable to update deals ,FAVE-15940,47422,,Bug,Closed,FAVE,Fave,software,Azuan Zira Zairein,557058:9ed2af55-7ed4-4d71-9112-86f1860c12d0,,,Medium,Done,Ervin Chai,61079ef7b704b40068e99bb1,luqman afif,606aa935c040cd0069b71293,luqman afif,606aa935c040cd0069b71293,22/Oct/21 10:32 AM,22/Oct/21 11:48 AM,29/Dec/21 5:32 PM,22/Oct/21 11:46 AM,Admin Tool,,,,,0,internaltool,magma_monitoring,production-bug,self-test,,,,"*Internal users try to update the deals and are unable to save and prompt an error*
Users are able to update the deal in Admin Tool
* The error message {{Tag has already been taken}} was shown.
* This error message was caused by {{sync_deal_tags}} in {{eagle_activity.rb}}. Previously this wasn't a problem because tags were case sensitive.
* However, due to the introduction of {{acts_as_ordered_taggable_on}} in the {{EagleActivity}} model, this might have made the tags case insensitive.

* Because Project Billy and our old Tagging system had inconsistencies between capitalization, the {{uniq}} function was not able to remove duplicates. The case insensitivity problem happens and gives this error message.","22/Oct/21 10:50 AM;61079ef7b704b40068e99bb1;Tested in {{columbus}}

column2: Ensure that duplicate case insensitive tags can be saved without the error message â€œTag has already been takenâ€

column1: # Enter â€œMalaysianâ€ and â€œAsianâ€ in Cuisine field in Catalogue Management.
# In the below section, enter â€œmalaysianâ€ and â€œasianâ€ in the Cuisines field.
# The deal should be able to be saved even though there was a duplicate tag with case insensitive.

# Back to {{My submission }}page to check status of contract
When both parties have been signed the contract, {{my submission }}will be updated the status.
Status is not updated after both parties signed the contract.
