* Bank account will not auto delete.
If new created sub-entity its not tagged to anything > user able to delete the sub-entity  (usual delete pop up confirmation)
If new created sub-entity that is tagged to any bank account > user should not be able to delete the entity, user will see a pop up stating
MSG: Caution : Entity is being tagged to *bank account(s)* , in order to delete, please reassign entity or delete the bank account.
If new created sub-entity that is tagged to any outlets > user should not be able to delete the entity, user will see a pop up stating
MSG:  Caution : Entity is being tagged to *outlet(s)* ,  in order to delete, please reassign a entity or delete the outlet(s).
If new created sub-entity that is tagged to any bank account and outlets> user should not be able to delete the entity, user will see a pop up stating
MSG:  Caution : Entity is being tagged to *outlet(s) and bank account(s)*  in order to delete,, please reassign a entity or delete the outlet(s).

* To add sub-entity name under acc owner",,Katelyn Soo,,,,557058:2f835b06-e18a-42a8-af45-3231fc68d42c,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,07/Oct/21 12:13 PM;katelyn@myfave.com;image-2021-10-07-12-13-46-880.png;https://kfit-asia.atlassian.net/secure/attachment/55803/image-2021-10-07-12-13-46-880.png,07/Oct/21 12:13 PM;katelyn@myfave.com;image-2021-10-07-12-13-48-396.png;https://kfit-asia.atlassian.net/secure/attachment/55802/image-2021-10-07-12-13-48-396.png,07/Oct/21 12:13 PM;katelyn@myfave.com;image-2021-10-07-12-13-53-730.png;https://kfit-asia.atlassian.net/secure/attachment/55801/image-2021-10-07-12-13-53-730.png,07/Oct/21 12:13 PM;katelyn@myfave.com;image-2021-10-07-12-13-58-146.png;https://kfit-asia.atlassian.net/secure/attachment/55800/image-2021-10-07-12-13-58-146.png,07/Oct/21 2:24 PM;katelyn@myfave.com;image-20211004-050449.png;https://kfit-asia.atlassian.net/secure/attachment/55812/image-20211004-050449.png,03/Nov/21 6:14 PM;katelyn@myfave.com;image-20211103-101412.png;https://kfit-asia.atlassian.net/secure/attachment/56517/image-20211103-101412.png,05/Nov/21 1:09 PM;katelyn@myfave.com;image-20211105-050833.png;https://kfit-asia.atlassian.net/secure/attachment/56525/image-20211105-050833.png,,,,,,,"We want SPECIFIC examples you can use the GHERKIN https://docs.cucumber.io/gherkin/reference/

column1: [MC - BE] FPO Flow : Outlet level Changes,FAVE-15770,47225,,Story,Development In Progress,FAVE,Fave,software,Azuan Zira Zairein,557058:9ed2af55-7ed4-4d71-9112-86f1860c12d0,,,Medium,,Hisyam Syazani,602b5d0f7fbca20070b65a41,Katelyn Soo,557058:2f835b06-e18a-42a8-af45-3231fc68d42c,Katelyn Soo,557058:2f835b06-e18a-42a8-af45-3231fc68d42c,11/Oct/21 9:18 AM,29/Dec/21 1:04 PM,29/Dec/21 1:07 PM,,Admin Tool,MC,,,,0,admintool,admin-tool,internaltool,internaltools,,,,"Given that, user adding an outlet, when they answer certain question, then certain related fields will appear.
* When user add an outlet the fields will not change, until user answer the question â€œis this outlet located in a mall?â€ and answer â€œNoâ€
* Another question will appear â€œ Is this an online merchant?â€
If No, user can proceed to filled in other fields and create outlet.
If Yes, Operating hour section will be hidden, a new field will appear â€œselect integration typeâ€ , and below link bank account a new section to upload documents
* Dropdown will be all the vendor list, by choosing the vendor type after submission , system will auto back filled the integration type on admin tool.
* Newly created outlet , which have yet to submit user able to change the value, but once submitted, the field will be disabled on merchant connect.
* If outlet is selected as online outlet , then the address is a non-mandatory field, but the newly added web url field is mandatory for online outlet
* By selecting a vendor name , the outlet name will be auto filled with \[Online- vender name]
* Update all the contract with Section C (Master contract, Deal addendum & Favepay addendum)
* with the address being non-mandatory , the information in the contract will display if the information its filled.
* Outlet name, follow by address (if applicable) , follow by website.
* Document uploaded will be save on the outlet level on admin tool, under outlet > contract > other documents
* All uploaded documents will be name as â€œ*FPO documentâ€*

column1: [MC - FE] FPO Flow : Outlet level Changes [MY/SG],FAVE-15779,47235,47225,Sub-task,Development In Progress,FAVE,Fave,software,Azuan Zira Zairein,557058:9ed2af55-7ed4-4d71-9112-86f1860c12d0,,,Medium,,Alex Safian,60f51e529f975e0069a42c9d,Katelyn Soo,557058:2f835b06-e18a-42a8-af45-3231fc68d42c,Katelyn Soo,557058:2f835b06-e18a-42a8-af45-3231fc68d42c,11/Oct/21 3:44 PM,29/Dec/21 1:03 PM,29/Dec/21 11:09 AM,,Admin Tool,MC,,,,0,admintool,admin-tool,internaltool,internaltools,,,,"Given that, user creating an outlet, there will be four scenario that need to be consider to accommodate normal & integrated outlet, when user answer certain question, then relevant fields will appear.
* User land on outlet page, user will need to answer the question below:
â†’ Select outlet type â†’ this is a default question {color:#ff5630}*mandatory*{color} *radio button, default offline*
â†’ Is this a FPO outlet â†’ This is a default question {color:#ff5630}*mandatory*{color} *radio button, default no*

column3: â†’ If *outlet type = offline* , *integration = no*, proceed with ""is outlet located in a mall?"" as per usual flow

column1: â†’ For normal outlet, outlet name no changes, fill in by BD

column3: â†’ If *outlet type = Online*, *integration = no*, proceed with outlet name *(is outlet located in a mall & operating hour will be hidden)*

column1: ~ user able to upload documents on outlet level which will be save under contract level (other documents),
~ Adding documents function can be added one by one and to be removed one by one with the file size indicated
~ Documents save under outlet level > contract > other documents
â†’ For normal outlet, outlet name no changes, fill in by BD

column3: â†’If *outlet type = offline , integration = yes* , show the *select integration type* *(dropdown, mandatory)* field , dropdown : Offline > Integrated - legacy (not acquirer) :

column1: (c) Operating hour will be show as usual,
(e) Once submitted, integration type should be disabled
â†’ For outlet name: {{[Offline- vendor name]}}

column3: â†’If *outlet type = online , integration = yes* , show the *select integration type (dropdown, mandatory)* field , dropdown : Online > integrated - Direct , Indirect online (not acquirer):

column1: (b) web url will be *show and is mandatory,*
(d) user able to upload documents on outlet level which will be save under contract level (other documents), *mandatory*
(e) Adding documents function can be added one by one and to be removed one by one with the file size indicated
~ Documents save under outlet level > contract > other documents
(f) Once submitted, integration type should be disabled
â†’ For outlet name:{{ [Online - vendor name]}}
* Newly created outlet , which have yet to submit user able to change the value, but once submitted, the field will be *disabled on merchant connect.*
* Upload file size should be max *10mb* per file
h2. +*Error msg for uploading documents, when documents does not meet the file type or size*+
h2. +*Once user saved outlet & outlet summary display*+
* Summary page will display according to the changed, proof of ownership and outlet details will slightly change.

[MEC Bug]  Sub-entities : Contract sent out not accurate,FAVE-15778,47234,,Story,Development In Progress,FAVE,Fave,software,Azuan Zira Zairein,557058:9ed2af55-7ed4-4d71-9112-86f1860c12d0,,,Medium,,Mohamed Zakarya Fekry,5d47d704da0c4d0c789a4541,Katelyn Soo,557058:2f835b06-e18a-42a8-af45-3231fc68d42c,Katelyn Soo,557058:2f835b06-e18a-42a8-af45-3231fc68d42c,11/Oct/21 3:08 PM,14/Dec/21 9:17 AM,27/Dec/21 11:22 AM,,Admin Tool,MC,,,,0,admintool,admin-tool,internaltool,internaltools,,,,"Given that, user sent multiple sub-entities, when user sent out multiple contract , Then the receiver should get the proper contract.

[Admin Tool] Listing file : Uploading on admin tool,FAVE-15782,47239,,Story,Closed,FAVE,Fave,software,Azuan Zira Zairein,557058:9ed2af55-7ed4-4d71-9112-86f1860c12d0,,,Medium,Done,Hisyam Syazani,602b5d0f7fbca20070b65a41,Katelyn Soo,557058:2f835b06-e18a-42a8-af45-3231fc68d42c,Katelyn Soo,557058:2f835b06-e18a-42a8-af45-3231fc68d42c,11/Oct/21 9:24 PM,22/Dec/21 9:44 AM,22/Dec/21 9:44 AM,22/Dec/21 9:44 AM,Admin Tool,MC,,,,0,admintool,admin-tool,internaltool,internaltools,,,,"Given that, TPA merchant will come in batches, when ops uses the listing file to upload profile, then it will be successfully created on admin tool.
* When Profile is created using a listing file, the profile should be able to be search on admin tool. *Profile status should be active*
* Adding another tab/sheet for bank account creation on company level, and allowing to tagged bank to respective outlet
* Fields needed on bank account tab for creation:
* Validation on business name needed, to know where should the bank account be created.
* Validation on outlet will indicate which bank account will be assigned to the outlet
* Only one bank account can be assigned to one outlet.
* On outlet level, allowing user to tagged it to the respective profile, this is to create the correct outlet on to the correct profile.
* Add a new tab/sheet on to the listing file
* Add in integration type *(mandatory)*, vender name *(mandatory)* , merchant ID & Store ID on *Outlet level*
* Add another tab to enabled Favepay

column1: [MC-MEC] Handle master contract status & product on MC for MEC  profile,FAVE-15491,46863,,Bug,Ready to Develop,FAVE,Fave,software,Azuan Zira Zairein,557058:9ed2af55-7ed4-4d71-9112-86f1860c12d0,,,Medium,,Mohamed Zakarya Fekry,5d47d704da0c4d0c789a4541,Katelyn Soo,557058:2f835b06-e18a-42a8-af45-3231fc68d42c,Katelyn Soo,557058:2f835b06-e18a-42a8-af45-3231fc68d42c,21/Sep/21 10:32 AM,14/Dec/21 9:17 AM,29/Dec/21 5:32 PM,,Admin Tool,MC,,,,0,admintool,admin-tool,internaltool,internaltools,,,,"Given that MEC profile consist of multiple master contract , when user trigger the master , then only all sub-entity signed will switch the master contract column to signed.
* New merchant - once all sub-entity signed only the status will turn to signed, if not â€œpend. Signatureâ€

column1: [BE-MC] Sub-entity display page (My submission),FAVE-13582,44620,,Story,Development In Progress,FAVE,Fave,software,Azuan Zira Zairein,557058:9ed2af55-7ed4-4d71-9112-86f1860c12d0,,,Medium,,Mohamed Zakarya Fekry,5d47d704da0c4d0c789a4541,Katelyn Soo,557058:2f835b06-e18a-42a8-af45-3231fc68d42c,Katelyn Soo,557058:2f835b06-e18a-42a8-af45-3231fc68d42c,08/May/21 9:39 PM,16/Dec/21 5:10 PM,16/Dec/21 5:43 PM,,Admin Tool,,,,,0,admintool,admin-tool,internaltool,internaltools,,,,"* *Given* the multiple entity submission has been submitted , *when* i click on â€œMy submissionâ€, *Then* im able to differentiate the submission for main entity or sub-entity.
Normal Case Scenarios - basic flow of the story
* On my submission , if thereâ€™s a submission via *Main Entity* , the display will be the *same as normal submission*
* By default it will filter as â€œAll Submissionâ€
* If thereâ€™s a submission via Sub-entity, the display will be different:
>  Merchant Name : will be the merchant brand name
>   Outlet name : default be â€œmultiple entities:
>   Submission status : pending (below will have a indication how many sub-entity are linked to this submission) , and the action button will only consist of *view*
* Edit resubmit a new merchant , all of the product will go back to draft
{quote}   > if one of the product get cancelled , then when bd edit resubmit will be empty
> if BD edit & resubmit while is still pend. acknowledgement , then the whole submission goes back to draft {quote}
* User able to click in to the multiple entity submission to view the progress

[MC] Admin tool : Product(s) Dashboard + Submission email,FAVE-13583,44621,44620,Sub-task,Closed,FAVE,Fave,software,Azuan Zira Zairein,557058:9ed2af55-7ed4-4d71-9112-86f1860c12d0,,,Medium,Done,Mohamed Zakarya Fekry,5d47d704da0c4d0c789a4541,Katelyn Soo,557058:2f835b06-e18a-42a8-af45-3231fc68d42c,Katelyn Soo,557058:2f835b06-e18a-42a8-af45-3231fc68d42c,08/May/21 11:18 PM,21/Sep/21 9:50 AM,29/Dec/21 5:32 PM,13/Sep/21 6:20 PM,Admin Tool,,,,,0,admintool,admin-tool,internaltool,internaltools,,,,"*Given* that submitted multiple entities submission, *When* i Click on to individual Product dashboard, *Then* it will be display  for ops to process.
*Normal Case Scenarios - basic flow of the story*
*CP Dashboard > QA Dashboard > Deal Live dashboard*
* Main entity or sub-entity submission will come in to the dashboard as per normal submission.
CP Dashboard > Once approved > submission will entre to QA Dashboard
QA Dashboard > Once compliance approved > submission will entre deal live dashboard
Deal live dashboard > Individual ops team able to assign and tick off > once all team is done , the submission will be remove from the dashboard.
* Individual team can assign and tick off, once all team is done, the submission will remove from dashboard
* Individual team can assign and tick off, once all team is done, the submission will remove from dashboard

column1: [MC] Admin Tool : Sub-entity page,FAVE-13584,44622,44620,Sub-task,Closed,FAVE,Fave,software,Azuan Zira Zairein,557058:9ed2af55-7ed4-4d71-9112-86f1860c12d0,,,Medium,Done,Hisyam Syazani,602b5d0f7fbca20070b65a41,Katelyn Soo,557058:2f835b06-e18a-42a8-af45-3231fc68d42c,Katelyn Soo,557058:2f835b06-e18a-42a8-af45-3231fc68d42c,09/May/21 12:28 AM,15/Sep/21 3:48 PM,29/Dec/21 5:32 PM,15/Sep/21 3:48 PM,Admin Tool,,,,,0,admintool,admin-tool,internaltool,internaltools,,,,"*Given* that ive submitted a multiple entities merchant, *When* i click on sub-entities page on merchant level , *Then* im able to access the contract and RPP info and edit the sub-entity information.
Normal Case Scenarios - basic flow of the story
* Adding a page on merchant level name â€œ Sub-entitiesâ€
* This page is able to access by all except for
* By clicking into sub-entity , user able to see the list of sub-entities
* user able to search by entity
* By clicking into Master Contract of individual sub-entity
* Sub-entity Master contract will be store in this level
* user able to  upload other documents as well
* For RPP, user able to generate the RPP document collection link.
* All RPP document will be store in this section
* By Clicking into the edit , user able to edit sub-entity information which will be updated on merchant connect & respective Contract(if applicable).

{{Note: By ticking the checkbox means that whenever this pos vendor is selected , the checked field above is mandatory.}}

column1: Freemium not updated after sign contract FavePay Later,FAVE-16439,48073,,Bug,Cancelled,FAVE,Fave,software,Azuan Zira Zairein,557058:9ed2af55-7ed4-4d71-9112-86f1860c12d0,,,Medium,Won't Do,,,luqman afif,606aa935c040cd0069b71293,luqman afif,606aa935c040cd0069b71293,14/Dec/21 3:54 PM,21/Dec/21 3:01 PM,29/Dec/21 2:18 PM,21/Dec/21 3:01 PM,Admin Tool,Backend,,,,0,admintool,production-bug,,,,,,"*About :*

An existing merchant that has yet to sign the FPL contract was granted x amount of freemium, *When* BD signed the FPL contract for the existing merchant, then FPL status is completed, it should zero rise the freemium.
{{The remaining Freemium}} will change to 0 after signing the contract and status is complete
After signing contract and status is complete, {{Remaining Freemium}} is no change to 0
